erajp: Convert datetime to Japanese era
=======================================

Requirements
------------

-  Python 2.7+, 3.4+

Installation
------------

Comming soon!

How to use
----------

::

    >>> strjpftime()
     'H27.08.05' # now
    >>> strjpftime(datetime.datetime(1989, 1, 8)) 
     'H1.01.08'
    >>> strjpftime(datetime.datetime(1989, 1, 8), u"%O%E年")
     '平成元年'
